Your sport challenge 7➛name_of_your_challenge has been successfully created!

Enjoy!

Many regards,

Your sport challenge team

Hi Trigger - Service Catalog➛...➛First name,

Thanks for proposing a new sport challenge. Unfortunately your proposal has been rejected.

Don't give up and propose new challenges. Maybe next time you're the lucky one!

Many regards,

The sport challenge team

sys_hub_flow_logic.comment: If subtype outdoor is Cycling then create record with subtype Cycling
If Indoor subtype is Pushup create Sport challenge record with subtype Pushups
If Subtype is Climbing Stairs create Sport challenge record with subtype Climbing stairs
If Type is outdoor get outdoor subtypes
If type is indoor get indoor subtypes
If subtype outdoor is Running then create record with subtype Running

sys_hub_flow_logic.comment: If Subtype is Climbing Stairs create Sport challenge record with subtype Climbing stairs
If subtype outdoor is Running then create record with subtype Running
If subtype outdoor is Cycling then create record with subtype Cycling
If Type is outdoor get outdoor subtypes
If type is indoor get indoor subtypes
If Indoor subtype is Pushup create Sport challenge record with subtype Pushups
